sen.j: 姉小路 公遂（あねがこうじ きんすい、寛政6年6月13日 (旧暦)（1794年7月9日） - 安政4年1月29日 (旧暦)（1857年2月23日））は、江戸時代の公卿。
sen.e: Kinsui ANEGAKOJI (July 9, 1794-February 23, 1857) was Kugyo (the top court officials) in the Edo period.
Kinsui ANEGAKOJI (July 9, 1794-February 23, 1857) was Kugyo (the top court officials) in the Edo period.
Kinsui ANEGAKOJI (July 9, 1794-February 23, 1857) was Kugyo (the top court officials) in the Edo period.

sen.j: 姉小路公春の子。
sen.e: He was a son of Kinmitsu ANEGAKOJI.
He was a son of Kinmitsu ANEGAKOJI.
He was a son of Kinmitsu ANEGAKOJI.

sen.j: 正室は松浦清の娘、継室は三条公修の娘。
sen.e: His lawful wife was a daughter of Kiyoshi MATSURA and his second wife was a daughter of Kinosa SANJO.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Kiyoshi MATSURA and his second wife was a daughter of Kinosa SANJO.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Kiyoshi MATSURA and his second wife was a daughter of Kinosa SANJO.

sen.j: 子には姉小路公前（姉小路公知の父）・澤宣嘉・石山基文らがいる。
sen.e: His children were Kinsaki ANEGAKOJI (the father of Kintomo ANEGAKOJI), Nobuyoshi SAWA, Motofumi ISHIYAMA and so on.
His children were Kinsaki ANEGAKOJI (the father of Kintomo ANEGAKOJI), Nobuyoshi SAWA, Motofumi ISHIYAMA and so on.
His children were Kinsaki ANEGAKOJI (the father of Kintomo ANEGAKOJI), Nobuyoshi SAWA, Motofumi ISHIYAMA and so on.

tit.e: The chronological list of the main events
The chronological list of the main events
The chronological list of the main events

sen.j: 享和2年（1802年）に従五位下に任じられる。
sen.e: In 1802 he was assigned to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1802 he was assigned to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1802 he was assigned to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 文化 (元号)元年（1804年）に元服する。
sen.e: In 1804 he was celebrated his attainment of manhood.
In 1804 he celebrated his attainment of manhood.
In 1804 he celebrated his attainment of manhood.

sen.j: 文化2年（1805年）従五位上。
sen.e: In 1805 Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade).
In 1805 he was assinged Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade).
sen.cmt: 前列と文が異なるためhe was assingedを追加しました。
sen.e: In 1805 he was assinged Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade).

sen.j: 文化4年（1807年）正五位下。
sen.e: In 1807 Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1807 Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1807 Shogoinoge (Senior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 文化6年（1809年）侍従となる。
sen.e: In 1809 Jiju (a chamberlain).
In 1809 Jiju (a chamberlain).
In 1809 Jiju (a chamberlain).

sen.j: 文化7年（1810年）従四位下。
sen.e: In 1810 Jushiinoge (Junior Forth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1810 Jushiinoge (Junior Forth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1810 Jushiinoge (Junior Forth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 文化9年（1812年）近衛府となる。
sen.e: In 1812 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).
In 1812 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).
In 1812 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).

sen.j: 文化10年（1813年）従四位上。
sen.e: In 1813 Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
In 1813 Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
In 1813 Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).

sen.j: 文化12年（1815年）正四位下。
sen.e: In 1815 Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1815 Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).
In 1815 Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 文政元年（1818年）近江国兼務。
sen.e: In 1818 he was assigned to an officer of the Omi Province at the same time.
In 1818 he was assigned to an officer of Omi Province in the same time.
sen.cmt: 冠詞削除、前置詞変更しました。
sen.e: In 1818 he was assigned to an officer of Omi Province in the same time.

sen.j: 文政4年（1821年）近衛府となる。
sen.e: In 1821 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu.
In 1821 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu.
In 1821 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu.

sen.j: 天保2年（1832年）近衛府となる。
sen.e: In 1832 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu.
In 1832 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu.
In 1832 he was assigned to an officer of Konoefu.

sen.j: 天保3年（1833年）従三位参議となり、公卿に加わる。
sen.e: In 1833 he was assigned to Jusani (Junior Third Rank) Sangi (councilor) and conferred to Kugyo (the top court officials).
In 1833 he was assigned to Jusani (Junior Third Rank) Sangi (councilor) and conferred to Kugyo (the top court officials).
In 1833 he was assigned to Jusani (Junior Third Rank) Sangi (councilor) and conferred to Kugyo (the top court officials).

sen.j: 天保4年（1834年）中納言となる。
sen.e: In 1834 he was assigned to Chunagon (middle councilor).
In 1834 he was assigned Chunagon (vice-councilor of state).
sen.cmt: Chunagon (middle councilor)→Chunagon (vice-councilor of state)統一リストに合わせました。
sen.e: In 1834 he was assigned Chunagon (vice-councilor of state).

sen.j: 天保7年（1837年）正三位。
sen.e: In 1837 Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).
In 1837 Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).
In 1837 Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).

sen.j: 天保13年（1843年）従二位。
sen.e: In 1843 Junii (Junior Second Rank).
In 1843 Junii (Junior Second Rank).
In 1843 Junii (Junior Second Rank).

sen.j: 弘化3年（1846年）正二位。
sen.e: In 1846 Shonii (Senior Second Rank).
In 1846 Shonii (Senior Second Rank).
In 1846 Shonii (Senior Second Rank).

sen.j: 安政4年（1857年）病気のために中納言を辞任して間もなく薨去。
sen.e: In 1857 he died soon after he resigned Chunagon because of disease.
In 1857 he died soon after he resigned Chunagon because of disease.
In 1857 he died soon after he resigned Chunagon because of disease.
